packages.name: Gold
packages.description: Increase participation and basic brand validation

packages.name: Platinum
packages.description: Work with top-level creatives, plus agency-style brand validation

packages.name: Managed
packages.description: A full agency experience without the agency price tag
content: Receive optimum results from your Platinum Contest Package and working one-on-one with an experienced Squadhelp Branding Consultant. With significantly more validation services, professional brief creation, and daily management of your contest by your Branding Expert, you'll receive an enhanced branding experience to closeout your branding project. Expected 1000+ Entries
